data.value:
Dear [donor],

Thank you for your generous contribution of [amount] to Open Institute on [date] that has helped to provide essential funding for we are now developing a new open-source mobile app for Open Institute so we can launch the app as soon as possible.

Through your generosity, we have been able to continue advancing the purpose of Open Institute, as a platform and launchpad serving to create more accountability and transparency in the world of fundraising for non-profit initiatives.

This email is serving as a 501(c)(3) tax-compliant donation receipt, for your records, and declaring that no goods or services were provided by the not-for-profit organization in return for the contribution. EIN (US-tax #): 82-1707895.
